description: This file defines an API client for a Flutter application, providing methods to communicate with a backend server for user authentication, fetching classes and students, marking attendance, and retrieving attendance data. It serves as an interface layer encapsulating HTTP requests and response parsing.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A class that wraps backend API endpoints, manages HTTP communications, and processes responses for attendance tracking functionalities.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates a user using email and password, processes the response to extract user information and token.

methods.name: getClasses
methods.description: Retrieves the list of classes accessible to the current user.

methods.name: getStudents
methods.description: Fetches the list of students in a specific class.

methods.name: markAttendance
methods.description: Sends a request to mark attendance for a specific entity.

methods.name: getToday
methods.description: Retrieves today's attendance data for a specific class.

methods.name: getWeekly
methods.description: Fetches weekly attendance aggregate data for a class.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Closes the HTTP client to clean up resources.
